## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)

## Checklist

- [ ] I've tested on a fresh WSL2 / Ubuntu installation (or Azure VM)
- [ ] I've run `kodra doctor` and all checks pass
- [ ] I've updated README.md if adding a new tool
- [ ] I've followed the code style in CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] My installer follows the standard pattern (check → install → verify)
